title: Merry Christmas!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Fufufu~ ğ…  Kanata-san, Iâ€™m done arranging the food!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Woah~! Hanayo-chan, great job! This is better than what I would have done! Iâ€™m glad I left it up to you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe......! What do you think about the way I set Lanzhu-san and Mia-chanâ€™s chicken and turkey?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Very good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>What about the cake?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Looks good too. Itâ€™s pretty~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Weâ€™re all set for the feast.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Setsuna-san just sent a message saying that she and the others are done with the decorations!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Alright, letâ€™s deliver the feast~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
